parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which the entries are sorted based on creation time. Valid values:

*   **Asc** (default): ascending order
*   **Desc**: descending order

Enumerated values:

*   asc
*   desc

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **5 to 30**. Default value: **10**.
